description:
Customise and enhance your farm with these new decorative fences and unique statues, then upgrade your Hoe and Watering Can further than ever to make growing crops easier and faster!

DLC pack contains:

• Bonus Hoe and Watering Can upgrades (two additional levels per tool)
• Seven Decorative Fence sets
• Decorative Harvest Goddess Statue
• Decorative Doc Statue
name: Decorations and Tool Upgrade Pack
